CHAT.comment: NIKE, INC., ET AL., Petitioners v. MARC KASKY.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:10 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LAURENCE H. TRIBE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL R. HOEBER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF LAURENCE H. TRIBE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:21 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
